alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:12PM CDT until July 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ARMSTRONG...SOUTHERN WHEELER...SOUTHEASTERN CARSON...GRAY...NORTHERN COLLINGSWORTH AND NORTHERN DONLEY COUNTIES... At 711 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mclean, or 23 miles west of Shamrock, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Shamrock, Wheeler, Mclean, Groom, Lefors, Howardwick, Lutie, Lake Mcclellan, Twitty, Lela, Samnorwood, Kellerville, Goodnight, Dozier, Alanreed and Greenbelt Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Wheeler
